en.name: M.ABDULWAHAB
en.cases_description: Survey No 26 Pettai village, Survey No 586/1, 583/2 & 586/1B of Nedunkulam Village, Tirunellveli taluk was conspired and deceived by preparing fake/forged documents, 4 persons jointly making death threats causing minor injuries to Mohamed Ilyas, unlawful assembly of about 500 persons blocking the public road in front of palayankottai centenary hall condemning the state government and central govt against citizenship amendment act,  more than 50 persons gathered illegaly to pay homage to Anna statue, Kamarajar statue, thevar statue, amedkar statue,preventing a public servant from discharging his duty, 372 persons gathered without prior permission blocked the road and obstructed traffic in support of the demand of farmers, 400 persons gathered and blocked the road demanding to remove ban on jallikattu, Protesting to cacel the bus fare hike..
